name: Exquisite Cadaver
description:
Exquisite Cadaver is a VR crowd game where player finds herself on a stage and the crowd votes for what will be added, removed or changed in the scene.

Damn you Blizzard, you were right all along.

Team Nippur:
- John Larsen
- Anders Wagner
- Andreas Frostholm
- Bastian Leonhardt Strube
- Francesco Laddomada
- Horatiu Roman
- Kemal Akay
